Name: Red Gemma
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine and briefly stir.
Review: Red berry flavours with light red wine tannins, liqueur sweetness and botanical depth courtesy of gin, all refreshed with fizz. Berry fizz!
History: Created 5th February 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England and named after Gemma Monaghan, who incidentally is a Mancunian who supports Liverpool FC.
Nutrition: One serving of Red Gemma contains 253 calories
